text: Joyce Marie Beatty (; n√©e Birdsong, March 12, 1950) is an American politician. She is the U.S. representative for Ohio's 3rd congressional district since 2013. She is the chair of the Congressional Black Caucus since 2021. Beatty is a member of the Democratic Party. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States Category:United States representatives from Ohio Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Dayton, Ohio Category:African-American politicians
title: Joyce Beatty
